snippet: Christopher and Adam Holms, the brothers behind the roughly three-month-old Norwalk Metropolitan Youth Ballet, hope the school meets a couple of needs they say they have come to recognize through their interactions with local youngsters.
abstract: Norwalk Metropolitan Youth Ballet, three-month-old school, will offer a full slate of classes for children ages 5 and up starting in September; founders, brothers Christopher and Adam Holms, hope school meets needs of area youth they have come to recognize through their interactions with local community (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: Christopher and Adam Holms, the brothers behind the roughly three-month-old Norwalk Metropolitan Youth Ballet, hope the school meets a couple of needs they say they have come to recognize through their interactions with local youngsters.

headline.main: Two Brothers, and the Blessings of Ballet
headline.print_headline: Two Brothers, and the Blessings of Ballet
